channel.title: Game crash after loading on ladder after silo monster
channel.description: Hello, Ive had a few issues with crashing in this game thus far. i have checked the install folder and it is in the correct spot. my current issue is after beating the silo monster going down the ladder to the next area after it loads the game crashes. if i try to open the game and load my saved game to that point it also crashes. not sure what to do. My other issue which has seemed to fix itself was every time i turned the flashlight on the game would freeze and crash. but not in a while. any help would be great. My system: MSI Military grade mother board (99fxa-gd65) AMD FX CPU 8-core 3.60ghz 16gigs of DDR3 RAM 2 Evga GeForce GTX 550 TI 2gb graphics cards in SLI. 2 1 TB seagate hard drives 950W Power supply (all bran new) hl2_4104_crash_2012_10_1T16_20_30C0.mdmp (114 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_10_1T3_49_32C0.mdmp (109 KB)

item.title: Game crash after loading on ladder after silo monster
item.dc:creator: buddawg88
item.description:
you must not have seen my setup then… i shouldn’t have a reason to have to turn my settings down, but in spite of your rudeness when i was just trying to get help i did it anyway… and it didn’t work. next incredibly smart theroy?

Seriously mate, no need to quadruple post. There are multiple FAQ and other threads on this. Try lowering your settings etc. just until you can get past the area etc. look around in some other threads…

item.title: Game crash after loading on ladder after silo monster
item.dc:creator: buddawg88
item.description:
Hello, Ive had a few issues with crashing in this game thus far. i have checked the install folder and it is in the correct spot. my current issue is after beating the silo monster going down the ladder to the next area after it loads the game crashes. if i try to open the game and load my saved game to that point it also crashes. not sure what to do. My other issue which has seemed to fix itself was every time i turned the flashlight on the game would freeze and crash. but not in a while. any help would be great.

My system:
MSI Military grade mother board (99fxa-gd65)
AMD FX CPU 8-core 3.60ghz
16gigs of DDR3 RAM
2 Evga GeForce GTX 550 TI 2gb graphics cards in SLI.
2 1 TB seagate hard drives
950W Power supply
(all bran new)
hl2_4104_crash_2012_10_1T16_20_30C0.mdmp (114 KB)
hl2_4104_crash_2012_10_1T3_49_32C0.mdmp (109 KB)
